alert.note: Alert for Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 8:20PM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Madison and Rankin Counties. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry. * WHEN...From Friday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 303.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring along the reach of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 301.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 303.0 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 303.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Ratliff`s Ferr 303.0 301.4 Sun 7 pm CST 302.1 302.2 302.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
